root.name: Kickin' Momma
root.description: FeaturesHours of play: 36 levels over 3 different worldsVariety: Fire, Ice, Rock, Multiplier, Splitter, Countdown, Impulse and Explosive pegs make each level unique and challenging!Accessorize: Unlock unique items to dress up Momma as you playChallenges: Bronze, Silver and Gold medal awards per levelGame Center enabled with Achievements and Leaderboards
